item.title: Microsoft Purview: Purging mails from Inboxes
item.description: Using Microsoft Purview, you can search for specific content in Exchange Online via a content search and initiate the purge process. This article provides guidance on how to do this. Before getting started You can also use the Threat Explorer in MDO to initiate a hard delete by performing a manual remediation. However, if you are using Threat Explorer, you are limited to 30 days, which is sufficient for most purge scenarios.

item.title: Microsoft Purview: Configuring a Data Loss Prevention Policy
item.description: Organizations have sensitive information under their control, such as credit card numbers or social security numbers. To protect this sensitive information and reduce risk, organizations need a way to prevent users from sharing it with people who shouldn’t have it. This practice is known as data loss prevention (DLP). In this article, I will explain how to configure it.
